!!MogwaiERDesignerModelXdm

Mogwai ERDesigner (http://mogwai.sourceforge.net/erdesigner/erdesigner.html" )
is a tool for modeling and visualizing database structures as entity relationship model (ER or ERM). 
It uses *.xdm files ("xml database model") a XML-based file format.

XSD3b can read MogwaiERDesignerModelXdm *.xdm files with the XSD3bXSLT - Xsd3bPlugin and the xsl-transformation 
	* Mogwai _ ERDesignerModel.xdm.xsd3b.xsl

note:
	
MogwaiERDesignerModelXdm is case insensitive while XSD3b is case sensitive
	* if your xdm modell contains two different domains "varchar2(20)" and  " VARCHAR2(20)" XSD3b will not import because of duplicte DataTypeDefinition DataTypeName-s
	* this error occurs if you import exampleOracle.xdm

For MogwaiERDesignerModelXdm, relation names are not unique, while for XSD3b RelationDefinition must be unique
	* if your xdm modell contains two different different relations with the same name "R 5", XSD3b will not import because of duplicte DataTypeDefinition DataTypeName-s
	* this error occurs if you import exampleMysql.xdm 

---
see also
	* Xsd3bPlugin
	* XSD3bXSLT
	* MogwaiERDesignerModelXdm
